description:
See http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/v1.0/cs-devguide-20091015.pdf page 15.

The dev guide talks specifically about versioning the Rackspace API, but this bug covers mapping arbitrary URL prefixes to arbitrary APIs (rackspace's v1.0 and future, as well as Amazon EC2 and anything else gets scope-creeped into the party.)
title: Support versioning in the API

comments.content:
See http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/v1.0/cs-devguide-20091015.pdf page 15.

The dev guide talks specifically about versioning the Rackspace API, but this bug covers mapping arbitrary URL prefixes to arbitrary APIs (rackspace's v1.0 and future, as well as Amazon EC2 and anything else gets scope-creeped into the party.)
